issues.description: The problem statement’s UML and text specify messageOnMilk() returns a boolean (true/false), but the solution’s Milkable interface and implementing classes use String return types. Students following the spec would implement a boolean method and then find their code conflicting with the reference implementation/tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML diagram and problem description to declare messageOnMilk() returning String (and returning descriptive messages) to match the solution, or alternatively change the solution interface and implementations to return boolean to align with the spec and adjust the tests accordingly.
